<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/scalartax/subscriptions/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This API endpoint is used to update the details of a specific Transaction.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"subscription":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the subscription","required":true},"contract_acceptance_date":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The date when the contract was accepted","required":true},"contract_termination_date":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The date when the contract was terminated","required":false},"contract_effective_date":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The date when the contract becomes effective","required":true},"contract_end_date":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The date when the contract ends","required":true},"service_activation_date":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The date when the service is activated","required":true},"service_end_date":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The date when the service ends","required":true},"status":{"type":"string","description":"Current status of the subscription","required":true},"billing_cycle":{"type":"string","description":"The billing cycle (e.g., monthly, yearly)","required":true},"billing_amount":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if billing is enabled or not","required":true},"created_by_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user who created the subscription","required":false},"updated_by_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user who last updated the subscription","required":false}},"required":["name","contract_acceptance_date","contract_termination_date","contract_effective_date","contract_end_date","service_activation_date","service_end_date","status","billing_cycle","billing_amount","created_by_id","updated_by_id"]}},"required":["subscription"],"title":"Subscription"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
